channel.title: Gpg on My Awesome Site
channel.description: Recent content in Gpg on My Awesome Site

item.title: Git in A Nutshell (+ Lazygit)
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: A seriously short introduction to Git and Github, with Lazygit as an automation tool for Git. Its not as hard as you assume. Dont overthink it.

item.title: The Standard Unix Password Manager: Pass
item.author: wildanpastioke@gmail.com (Wildan)
item.description: Password management should be simple and follow Unix philosophy. With pass, each password lives inside of a gpg encrypted file.
